title: Design of an Integrated Digital Anatomy Education Platform: A Mixed-Methods Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic anatomical terminology and general knowledge of human body structures
context.additional_context: Since learners may have limited experience with digital devices, foundational functionality training must precede advanced instruction. Practical spaces and support systems are required for utilizing digital tools in offline environments

learning_goals: Learners can visually explain the spatial relationships of major organ systems using 3D virtual dissection tools
Learners can analyze anatomical structures using annotation features provided by digital platforms and label them with over 80% accuracy
Learners can pass quizzes related to human anatomy with over 70% accuracy using in-platform assessment tools

resources: Tablet PC or Desktop Computer (1 per learner)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
